description: CI/CD Pipeline for App Distribution - Android APK with QR code sharing, local iOS builds

userStories.title: Document local iOS build process
userStories.description: As a developer, I want documented steps to build and run on iPhone without Apple Developer account.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Local iOS Build' section to AGENTS.md
Document: npx expo prebuild to generate ios folder
Document: open ios/PomodoroTimer.xcworkspace in Xcode
Document: sign with free Apple ID (Personal Team) in Xcode
Document: run on connected iPhone via USB
Note 7-day certificate expiration limitation
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create eas.json with Android preview profile
userStories.description: As a developer, I need EAS configuration to build Android APKs for distribution.
acceptanceCriteria: Create eas.json in PomodoroTimer directory
Configure 'preview' profile with buildType: 'apk' for Android
Configure 'production' profile for future store builds
Set android.versionCode autoIncrement
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create GitHub Actions workflow for Android APK
userStories.description: As a developer, I want automated Android builds triggered by git tags.
acceptanceCriteria: Create .github/workflows/build-android.yml
Trigger on push of tags matching v*.*.* pattern
Support manual workflow_dispatch with version input
Use bun for package installation
Run eas build --platform android --profile preview --non-interactive
Authenticate with EXPO_TOKEN secret
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Upload APK to GitHub Releases
userStories.description: As a developer, I want APK attached to GitHub releases for easy download.
acceptanceCriteria: Workflow downloads APK after EAS build completes
Workflow creates GitHub Release with tag name
APK attached to release as downloadable asset
Release includes build notes with version
Typecheck passes

userStories.description: As a user, I want easy instructions to download and install the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Create README.md in PomodoroTimer directory
